rev.comment: removing information: it does not seems to be true, the last message seems to be from 2009
rev.diff:
Line 179: Line 179:
Bitcoin was created by a person or persons going by the name '''Satoshi Nakamoto'''. Nakamoto first published a white paper on Bitcoin in 2008 and then in 2009 founded the open source project called Bitcoin. The real identity of "Satoshi Nakamoto" is unknown. In his P2P Foundation profile<ref name="p2p_f_profile">[http://p2pfoundation.ning.com/profile/SatoshiNakamoto Satoshi Nakamoto profile on P2P Foundation]</ref> he said he is from Japan.
Bitcoin was created by a person or persons going by the name '''Satoshi Nakamoto'''. Nakamoto first published a white paper on Bitcoin in 2008 and then in 2009 founded the open source project called Bitcoin. The real identity of "Satoshi Nakamoto" is unknown. In his P2P Foundation profile<ref name="p2p_f_profile">[http://p2pfoundation.ning.com/profile/SatoshiNakamoto Satoshi Nakamoto profile on P2P Foundation]</ref> he said he is from Japan.
â
Nakamoto has apparently stopped contributing source as well as communicating with the bitcoin project as noted in a transcript from the #bitcoin-dev [[IRC]] channel.<ref>[http://bitcoinstats.com/irc/bitcoin-dev/logs/2011/04/26/5#l445170 Bitcoin IRC channel log]</ref> A person with the same name still contributes to the [[cryptography]] mailing list.<ref>[http://www.mail-archive.com/search?l=cryptography@metzdowd.com&q=from:%22Satoshi+Nakamoto%22 Satoshi's posts to Cryptography mailing list]</ref>
+
Nakamoto has apparently stopped contributing source as well as communicating with the bitcoin project as noted in a transcript from the #bitcoin-dev [[IRC]] channel.<ref>[http://bitcoinstats.com/irc/bitcoin-dev/logs/2011/04/26/5#l445170 Bitcoin IRC channel log]</ref>
